mapper.select: select fault_room_rate,wireless_rate from PM_GFS_INDICATE_WEEK where FGS=#{name} and TIME between to_date(#{monday},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{sunday},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
select ${name} ,time TIME from PM_GFS_INDICATE_WEEK where fgs = #{city} and time between to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') order by time
